title: Network Administrator
job_description: As a Network Administrator at PECO Software, you work to ensure network availability, security, and performance. You are part of the operations team and work both with daily operations and larger network projects.
tasks: Configuration and maintenance of network equipment (routers, switches, firewalls)
Implementing security policies and network segmentation
Support other teams with network-related issues
technical_skills: Deep understanding of TCP/IP, routing, and switching
Knowledge of network monitoring tools (e.g., Zabbix, Nagios)
Certifications such as CCNA/CCNP are a plus
